Definition.WordDefinition:
motivating \motivating\ motivative \motivative\adj. causing motion or impelling to action; providing a motive[2]; as, motivating arguments.
Syn: motive(prenominal). [WordNet 1.5]
It may well be that ethical language has primarily a motivative function --Arthur Pap

motivating adj : impelling to action; "it may well be that ethical language has primarily a motivative function"- Arthur Pap; "motive pleas"; "motivating arguments" [syn: {motivative(a)}, {motive(a)}] n : the act of motivating; providing incentive [syn: {motivation}]
